title: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type
description: Bug 7785 - SaveAs Forgets the file type. The icon has also changed from the parent Java file icon to a generic file icon.
OB: The file is saved without an extension and is displayed with a generic file icon. Opening the file shows that it is opened as plain text.
EB: The file should be saved with the same extension as the original file unless explicitly changed. The file icon should remain as the Java file icon.
SR:
1) Open an existing Java file. 
2) Make modifications to the file (e.g., move an existing class). 
3) Click on the SaveAs icon located next to the Save icon. A dialog will appear. 
4) Browse for a valid save location. 
5) Enter the filename without specifying the extension. 
6) Click on Ok. 

Verify that the file is saved with the same extension as the original file and that the Java file icon is retained.
